name: UIKeyboardType
desc: Constants that specify the type of keyboard to display for a text-based view.

items.name: case `default`
items.desc: Specifies the default keyboard for the current input method.

items.name: case asciiCapable
items.desc: Specifies a keyboard that displays standard ASCII characters.

items.name: case numbersAndPunctuation
items.desc: Specifies the numbers and punctuation keyboard.

items.name: case URL
items.desc: Specifies a keyboard for URL entry.

items.name: case numberPad
items.desc: Specifies a numeric keypad for PIN entry.

items.name: case phonePad
items.desc: Specifies a keypad for entering telephone numbers.

items.name: case namePhonePad
items.desc: Specifies a keypad for entering a person’s name or phone number.

items.name: case emailAddress
items.desc: Specifies a keyboard for entering email addresses.

items.name: case decimalPad
items.desc: Specifies a keyboard with numbers and a decimal point.

items.name: case twitter
items.desc: Specifies a keyboard for Twitter text entry, with easy access to the at (“@”) and hash (“#”) characters.

items.name: case webSearch
items.desc: Specifies a keyboard for web search terms and URL entry.

items.name: case asciiCapableNumberPad
items.desc: Specifies a number pad that outputs only ASCII digits.

items.name: static var alphabet: UIKeyboardType
items.desc: Specifies a keyboard for alphabetic entry.
